languages.text: "Весь их предательский род давно надо было замуровать в цистерну, нашпигованную фузелином, вышвырнуть в пустоту и подорвать. Подонок сейчас держит оборону в отсеке 45-F-1, мои люди зажали его банду в угол. Скоро возьмем гада".

"That entire traitorous bloodline should have been sealed in a tank of fyceline, thrown into the void, and blown up a long time ago. The whoreson has mounted a defence in Bay 45-F-1, but my people have his gang cornered. We will get him soon enough."
languages.original_text: "Весь их предательский род давно надо было замуровать в цистерну, нашпигованную фузелином, вышвырнуть в пустоту и подорвать. Подонок сейчас держит оборону в отсеке 45-F-1, мои люди зажали его банду в угол. Скоро возьмем гада".

traits.locale_text: "The entire traitorous bloodline should have been sealed in a tank of fyceline, thrown into the void, and blown up a long time ago. The bastard has mounted a defence in compartment 45-F-1, but my men have his gang cornered. We'll get the scumbag soon enough."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: «El maldito linaje traidor entero debería haber sido sellado en un tanque de fycelina, lanzado al vacío y detonado hace mucho tiempo. El muy hijo de puta tiene montada una línea defensiva en la Bahía 45-F-1, pero mi gente tiene acorralada a su banda. Pronto caerá en nuestras manos».
languages.original_text: "That entire traitorous bloodline should have been sealed in a tank of fyceline, thrown into the void, and blown up a long time ago. The whoreson has mounted a defence in Bay 45-F-1, but my people have his gang cornered. We will get him soon enough."

traits.locale_text: «El maldito linaje traidor entero debería haber sido sellado en un tanque de fycelina, lanzado al vacío y detonado hace mucho tiempo. El muy hijo de puta tiene montada una línea defensiva en la Bahía 45-F-1, pero mi gente tiene acorralada a su banda. Pronto caerá en nuestras manos».
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: 「あの裏切り者の血筋の者は全員、ファイセリン燃料のタンクに封じ込めて虚空に放り出され、とっくの昔に爆破されているはずです。あのならず者はベイ45-F-1で防衛戦を展開していますが、私の部下が一味を追い詰めています。すぐに捕まえましょう」
languages.original_text: "That entire traitorous bloodline should have been sealed in a tank of fyceline, thrown into the void, and blown up a long time ago. The whoreson has mounted a defence in Bay 45-F-1, but my people have his gang cornered. We will get him soon enough."

traits.locale_text: 「あの裏切り者の血筋の者は全員、ファイセリン燃料のタンクに封じ込めて虚空に放り出され、とっくの昔に爆破されているはずです。あのならず者はベイ45-F-1で防衛戦を展開していますが、私の部下が一味を追い詰めています。すぐに捕まえましょう」
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: “当初收拾那些叛徒的时候，就该把他们家族所有人都塞进火药桶里，从气闸里扔出去，直接炸了。那个狗娘养的家伙，他在45-F-1区甲板设置了防御工事，但我的人已经把那群混蛋逼入绝境了。我们很快就会抓到他。”
languages.original_text: "That entire traitorous bloodline should have been sealed in a tank of fyceline, thrown into the void, and blown up a long time ago. The whoreson has mounted a defence in Bay 45-F-1, but my people have his gang cornered. We will get him soon enough."

traits.locale_text: “当初收拾那些叛徒的时候，就该把他们家族所有人都塞进火药桶里，从气闸里扔出去，直接炸了。那个狗娘养的家伙，他在45-F-1区甲板设置了防御工事，但我的人已经把那群混蛋逼入绝境了。我们很快就会抓到他。”
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Diese gesamte verräterische Blutlinie wurde schon vor langer Zeit in einem Fycelin-Tank versiegelt, in die Leere geworfen und in die Luft gejagt. Der Hurensohn hat sich in Modul 45-F-1 verschanzt, doch meine Leute haben seine Bande umstellt. Wir werden ihn schon bald kriegen."
languages.original_text: "That entire traitorous bloodline should have been sealed in a tank of fyceline, thrown into the void, and blown up a long time ago. The whoreson has mounted a defence in Bay 45-F-1, but my people have his gang cornered. We will get him soon enough."

traits.locale_text: "Diese gesamte verräterische Blutlinie wurde schon vor langer Zeit in einem Fycelin-Tank versiegelt, in die Leere geworfen und in die Luft gejagt. Der Hurensohn hat sich in Modul 45-F-1 verschanzt, doch meine Leute haben seine Bande umstellt. Wir werden ihn schon bald kriegen."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: « Toute cette lignée félonne aurait dû être enfermée dans un réservoir de fyceline, balancée dans le vide et massacrée à coup de canon depuis bien longtemps. Ce fils de chien a organisé un mur de défense dans la baie 45-F-1, mais mes hommes ont réussi à les acculer, lui et ses sbires, et ce n'est plus qu'une question de temps avant qu'on lui mette la main dessus. »
languages.original_text: "That entire traitorous bloodline should have been sealed in a tank of fyceline, thrown into the void, and blown up a long time ago. The whoreson has mounted a defence in Bay 45-F-1, but my people have his gang cornered. We will get him soon enough."

traits.locale_text: « Toute cette lignée félonne aurait dû être enfermée dans un réservoir de fyceline, balancée dans le vide et massacrée à coup de canon depuis bien longtemps. Ce fils de chien a organisé un mur de défense dans la baie 45-F-1, mais mes hommes ont réussi à les acculer, lui et ses sbires, et ce n'est plus qu'une question de temps avant qu'on lui mette la main dessus. »
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "O hain soyun tamamı uzun zaman önce fiselin dolu bir hazneye kapatılmalı, uçsuza fırlatılıp patlatılmalıydı. Kancığın evladı, 45-F-1 Bölmesi'nde savunmaya çekildi. Adamlarım, çetesini köşeye sıkıştırdı. Yakında işini bitireceğiz."
languages.original_text: "That entire traitorous bloodline should have been sealed in a tank of fyceline, thrown into the void, and blown up a long time ago. The whoreson has mounted a defence in Bay 45-F-1, but my people have his gang cornered. We will get him soon enough."
